subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

R U Kidding me ?
This is Frank's group and I am here to learn how to make t=
he boxes and talk amongst other people
with boxes about what we get... we a=
re not here to listen to people who don't believe in what we are
doing or t=
rying to do.... If you don't have a box to work with or listen to, how can =
you be skeptical about
what someone hears regardless of whether they write =
out what they hear or not? Alot of times we don't hear
the same things ,so =
it is ridiculous for people to believe it's the power of suggestion.
RJ's e=
xperiments are to disprove for his own personal reasons, not to help this g=
roup in any way.
So, why don't you skeptical people and the ones who want t=
o try different methods and any other personal
ideas that you have, start y=
our own group?  This is Frank's group......
I personally want to see what F=
rank and Steve come up with and that's why MOST of us are here....
not to c=
riticize them..or try to do experiments disproving anything....

__________=
______________________
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com] On Behalf Of Salvi
Sent: Monday, August 23, 2010 8:21 AM
To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: AW: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



if frank will end tha=
t project here, then you (or we all) have the possibility to open another y=
ahoo group and we can continue
to discussing. in a group all members must h=
ave the opportunity to write his ideas and, if someone like RJ (or some oth=
ers,
maybe like me) tend to other types of ideas and try to point to other =
prespectives, what is here wrong?

we must be prepared to all evidences, al=
so evidences that are not convenient to our personal ideas but
maybe we can=
 learn something more and we can change our point of view. think about that=
.

i try to reach the goal of the "voices" with a sceptict mind, but i am e=
xperimenting with many differente methods to hopefully
reach maybe one day =
something more convincing.

Von: EVP-ITC@y=

An: 'EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com'
B=
etreff: RE: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



I am  worried that he is going to push Fran=
k to far and Frank will not be here anymore
THAT IS WHAT I AM AFRAID OF... =
And he is the most important person here.
It's his group....and if he gets =
mad enough he will end it, and then what ?

_______________________________=

Of Salvi
Sent: Monday, August 23, 2010 7:44 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

Subject: AW: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



i hope that RJ stay for a long time here b=
ecause i like its methods and his ideas.
if you dont like read his mails, t=
hen lets swing the delete key on your keyboard.
leave him write his ideas, =
because others (like me) want to continue to read.

Von: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] Im =
Auftrag von Fransen, Debbie
Gesendet: Montag, 23. August 2010 13:25
An: 'EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com'
Betreff: RE: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



RJ, it is very obvi=
ous that you are not here for the same reasons we are. We are trying to pro=
ve something we know, and
you are trying to disprove it .
Why don't we all =
just ignore him from now on and not reply to anything he says and maybe he =
will go away.....
Bye RJ. You are just not in the group that you need to be=
 in....


________________________________
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [m=
ailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Rj
Sent: Sunday, August 22, 201=
0 6:17 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



I re=
alize you have plenty of subjective anecdotal evidence.I don't consider tha=
t 'hard evidence' however.  I am looking for something a little more object=
ive and less subject to influence and interpretations.

And stop putting wo=
rds in my mouth. A person can misinterpret something, mistake something, or=
 confuse something, without lying about something.  And before you jump dow=
n my throat claiming I am saying all results are mistakes, I am not.  I am =
performing experiments, keeping an open mind, and considering all evidence =
I find.

The way you have been attacking me by calling me names at every tu=
rn, just because I try new things and don't always agree with your world vi=
ew, is eerily reminiscent of the way the church of old tried to suppress ne=
w thought and discoveries, except you're just substituting the word 'hereti=
c' with 'science'. and 'blasphemy' with anything that disagrees with you.

=
There's an old saying:  "We become that which we hate".  So far, all you've=
 done is denounce people's efforts to try new methods and see what works.  =
You accept nothing anyone else proposes if it does not agree with you.  Tha=
t is the realm of the extreme skeptic: the same skeptic you ridicule.

You =
certainly don't have to agree with my comments.  And I don't have to agree =
with yours.  But no one needs all the name calling Frank.   It really adds =
nothing to support your theories.



--- On Sun, 8/22/10, Frank Sumption <p=
urplealiengirl@...> wrote:

From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@gma=
il.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sun=
day, August 22, 2010, 2:15 PM



 Yeah I know, science no accept anecdotes.=
 There is plenty of hard evidence, trouble, science don't accept that eithe=
r cuz they are taught, no spirits, so there are no sprit voices, fact is fa=
ct is facts. Well that's about all there is in this field. Perhaps you shou=
ld take bird watching or something concrete. To not accept what others say =
is the same as calling us all liars, and I find very insulting.

 How irrat=
ional is it to ignore all evidence and continuously try to fit the phenomon=
 into a diffintion where it will not fit and does not belong, and then clai=
m you're looking for a more rational explantation, it just does not make se=
nse. I say forget the BS "science" whatever that is, puts out and try think=
ing on your own.  Mr Spock was a fictional charactor!

 F-S



On Sun, Aug =
22, 2010 at 7:20 AM, Rj <rasterer@...</mc/compose?to=3Drasterer@yahoo=
.com>> wrote:


Experimental data in controlled conditions, and personal an=
ecdotes, are not the same thing,

iengirl@...>>

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om</mc/compose?to=3DEVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Sunday, August 22, 2010,=
 12:21 AM




 If you completely ignore what everyone else in the whole wid=
e freaking world gets via EVP, various photography and ITC methods, and jus=
t chance encounters, then yeah, you probably don't have any data, and won't=
 have any data no matter what.

F-S

On Sat, Aug 21, 2010 at 3:42 PM, Rick =
Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@...<http://mc/compose?to=3Drickwegrzyn@...=
>> wrote:


Hey RJ,I think we need to go to the cemetary and see what you g=

From: Rj <rasterer@...=
<http://mc/compose?to=3Drasterer@...>>

To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<h=
ttp://mc/compose?to=3DEVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sat, August 21, 2010 2=
:29:36 PM

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



I don't think I have enough dat=
a yet to make any conclusions, so I plan more experiments.  Since there are=
 different distinct claims about what the box or the recorders can do, I tr=
y to make different distinct experiments for each.

Some people claim they =
can get the box to tell them things that the operator couldn't know, so my =
"whats the object" experiment is one way to examine that.  Some people clai=
m the boxes can make predictions, so cataloging predictions and examining t=
he results can help examine that.  If there are other claims, I will try to=
 figure experiments based on those.

--- On Sat, 8/21/10, Frank Sumption <p=
urplealiengirl@...<http://mc/compose?to=3Dpurplealiengirl@...>>=
 wrote:

From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...<http://mc/compose?=
to=3Dpurplealiengirl@...>>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,
To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com<http://mc/compose?to=3DEVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Satur=
day, August 21, 2010, 12:48 PM



 I get our last dogs from time to time, a=
nd used to get them via white noise when I first started this. Last summer =
some kids came down into the basement wiht the younger grandson, and the li=
ttle yorkie barked, but "get outta here" came out, some how.

 Yeah, I thin=
k I was too hard on RJ. I don't know why, but testing doens't seem to work,=
 but we get enough to prove this to ourselves. It's probably a faith thing,=
 although I'm not religious, even anti-religion.

 F-S




On Fri, Aug 20, =
2010 at 6:27 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

[Attachment(s)<https://mail.go=
ogle.com/mail/?ui=3D2&view=3Djs&name=3Dmain,tlist&ver=3D9oD1J7yvz5o.en.&am=
=3D%21xONyw1plirqxhZ4a1PIWg1xlTveuJ8oWIzqJ6mz0Dt83ht4Zrp4&fri#12a920b21a629=
5da_TopText> from SnowfireL@... included below]

Here is a short file, =
where someone says, "Scamp, Scamp," then Scamp barks. "yap."  This little d=
og belonged to my grandma, when I was about 9 or 10 years old, he was a Man=
chester Terrier, and lived with us for many years, and this is his bark for=
 sure.  I'd know that bark anywhere.  Sorry, that I can't make it any clear=
er, I need to get one of those better ghost boxes I guess.  RJ, spirits are=
 just like us, they are not omnipresent like God,  probably why David doesn=
't want to play the guessing game, he has better things to do over there, a=
nd has said, they have thousands of people standing in this long line waiti=
ng to get into the Heavens, and He can't just drop His job and go to your h=
ouse to see what you have over there, He did tell me that first time what i=
t was, and i sent it to you, but it was too late.  It's hard for me to unde=
rstand them sometimes, He was also right about that little boy, Syler being=
 killed, and where his body would be found, I don't know what they did abou=
t it though. sf

    <TD vAlign=3Dtop>I =
realize you have plenty of subjective anecdotal 
      evidence.I don't con=
sider that 'hard evidence' however.  I am looking 
      for something=
 a little more objective and less subject to influence and 
      interpret=
ations.<BR><BR>And stop putting words in my mouth. A person can

nterpret something, mistake something, or confuse something, without 
     =
 lying about something.  And before you jump down my throat claiming I=
 
      am saying all results are mistakes, I am not.  I am performing=
 
      experiments, keeping an open mind, and considering all evidence I f=
ind. 
      <BR><BR>The way you have been attacking me by calling me names =
at every 
      turn, just because I try new things and don't always agree =
with your world 
      view, is eerily reminiscent of the way the church of=
 old tried to suppress 
      new thought and discoveries, except you're ju=
st substituting the word
